Hi...
As a newbie to Quest (3-4 days) I was wondering if it's possible, after creating an object with an action, to automatically refresh the screen after a five second delay and show the new item with the room description.

Also, I wrote the game in the first person... I've managed to get all the correct responses e.g. '[b:1mfhiwdj]I can see...[/b:1mfhiwdj]', '[b:1mfhiwdj]I pick up the...[/b:1mfhiwdj]' etc. but the inventory request still says, '[b:1mfhiwdj]You are carrying...[/b:1mfhiwdj]'. How do I change this to '[b:1mfhiwdj]I am carrying...[/b:1mfhiwdj]'?

Posts.EditableText:
There's currently no way of updating existing text, and anyway I think it would look a bit strange. Would you still have the "take object" command underneath the updated room description?

You can change the "You are carrying" text by modifying the CarryingListHeader template.
